title: Replace text field with local file monitoring
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Replace the ACE Editor text input with local file monitoring:

1. Add file monitoring capability to watch a configured local file
2. When file changes, read content and call mapActions.setMapText(fileContent)
3. Remove the ACE Editor/text field from the UI
4. Add simple UI to configure which file to monitor

Key files:
- src/components/editor/Editor.tsx - current ACE Editor to remove
- src/components/MapEnvironment.tsx - contains mutateMapText, state management
- src/hooks/useUnifiedMapState.ts - state management hook

Parsing pipeline remains unchanged - only input source changes from typing to file reads.

Local commit only - no push needed.
